statements: SELECT * FROM gender_based_violence_statistics;
SELECT victim_name, victim_gender FROM gender_based_violence_statistics ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM gender_based_violence_statistics WHERE perpetrator_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT victim_name, judicial_outcome FROM gender_based_violence_statistics WHERE victim_gender = 'Female';
SELECT MAX(incident_date) AS latest_incident_date FROM gender_based_violence_statistics;
SELECT * FROM gender_based_violence_statistics WHERE perpetrator_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT victim_name, incident_date, judicial_outcome FROM gender_based_violence_statistics WHERE victim_gender = 'Female' ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_cases FROM gender_based_violence_statistics WHERE victim_gender = 'Male';
SELECT perpetrator_name, COUNT(*) AS total_cases FROM gender_based_violence_statistics GROUP BY perpetrator_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT DISTINCT victim_name, judicial_outcome FROM gender_based_violence_statistics WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM gender_violence_cases;
SELECT case_id, victim_name, incident_date FROM gender_violence_cases ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT victim_name, victim_gender FROM gender_violence_cases WHERE victim_gender = 'Female';
SELECT case_id, judicial_outcome FROM judicial_outcomes WHERE court_name = 'Supreme Court';
SELECT victim_name, judicial_outcome, incident_date FROM gender_violence_cases JOIN judicial_outcomes ON gender_violence_cases.case_id = judicial_outcomes.case_id;
SELECT * FROM gender_violence_cases WHERE victim_gender = 'Female' ORDER BY incident_date DESC;

SELECT victim_name, incident_date, judicial_outcome FROM gender_violence_cases INNER JOIN judicial_outcomes ON gender_violence_cases.case_id = judicial_outcomes.case_id WHERE judicial_outcome = 'Convicted' AND court_name = 'Supreme Court';
SELECT victim_name, incident_date, judicial_outcome FROM gender_violence_cases WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY incident_date;

SELECT gender_violence_cases.victim_name, judicial_outcomes.outcome FROM gender_violence_cases LEFT JOIN judicial_outcomes ON gender_violence_cases.case_id = judicial_outcomes.case_id WHERE judicial_outcomes.outcome IS NULL;
SELECT victim_name, COUNT(*) AS total_cases FROM gender_violence_cases GROUP BY victim_name HAVING total_cases > 1 ORDER BY total_cases DESC;
SELECT * FROM GenderBasedViolenceCases;
SELECT victim_name, incident_date FROM GenderBasedViolenceCases;
SELECT victim_name, victim_gender, judicial_outcome FROM GenderBasedViolenceCases;
SELECT * FROM JudicialOutcomes;
SELECT outcome_description, trial_date, verdict FROM JudicialOutcomes;
SELECT * FROM GenderBasedViolenceCases;
SELECT * FROM JudicialOutcomes WHERE trial_date >= '2022-01-01' AND trial_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT victim_name, incident_date FROM GenderBasedViolenceCases WHERE victim_gender = 'Female';
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM CaseLocations ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT j.outcome_description, c.victim_name, j.verdict FROM JudicialOutcomes j JOIN GenderBasedViolenceCases c ON j.case_id = c.case_id;
SELECT * FROM GenderBasedViolenceCases;
SELECT victim_name, offender_name FROM GenderBasedViolenceCases;
SELECT report_date, incident_date, victim_name FROM GenderBasedViolenceCases;
SELECT * FROM JudicialOutcomes ORDER BY verdict_date DESC;
SELECT agency_name, city, state FROM ReportingAgencies;
SELECT * FROM GenderBasedViolenceCases;
SELECT victim_name, offender_name, incident_date FROM GenderBasedViolenceCases WHERE victim_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT agency_name, city, state FROM ReportingAgencies WHERE state='California' ORDER BY agency_name;
SELECT verdict, sentencing, verdict_date FROM JudicialOutcomes WHERE sentencing='Prison' AND verdict='Guilty';

SELECT g.case_id, o.verdict, p.agency_id FROM GenderBasedViolenceCases g JOIN JudicialOutcomes o ON g.case_id = o.case_id JOIN PolicyEvaluation p ON g.case_id = p.case_id WHERE o.verdict='Not Guilty' ORDER BY p.evaluation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM GenderViolenceCases;
SELECT case_id, case_description, reported_date FROM GenderViolenceCases ORDER BY reported_date DESC;
SELECT victim_name, victim_age, victim_gender FROM Victims WHERE victim_age > 30;
SELECT perpetrator_name, perpetrator_gender, perpetrator_relationship FROM Perpetrators WHERE perpetrator_gender = 'Male';
SELECT action_type, action_date FROM LegalActions WHERE action_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM GenderViolenceCases;
SELECT case_id, case_description, gender_of_victim, outcome FROM GenderViolenceCases WHERE reported_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT victim_name, victim_age, victim_gender, GenderViolenceCases.case_description FROM Victims JOIN GenderViolenceCases ON Victims.case_id = GenderViolenceCases.case_id;
SELECT GenderViolenceCases.case_id, CASE WHEN outcome = 'Guilty' THEN 'Convicted' ELSE 'Not Convicted' END AS judicial_verdict FROM GenderViolenceCases;

SELECT perpetrator_name, perpetrator_gender, LegalActions.action_type FROM Perpetrators JOIN GenderViolenceCases ON Perpetrators.case_id = GenderViolenceCases.case_id JOIN LegalActions ON GenderViolenceCases.case_id = LegalActions.case_id;
